title: "random Forest Explainer"

---
https://cran.rstudio.com/web/packages/randomForestExplainer/vignettes/randomForestExplainer.html
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(randomForestExplainer)
library('tidyverse')
library(pROC)
library(randomForest)
library(plyr)
```

# import dataset
```{r }
rf.model=readRDS(here::here("output","model_RandomForest.rds"))
print(rf.model)

plot(rf.model)
```


```{r}
min_depth_frame <- min_depth_distribution(rf.model)
head(min_depth_frame)
plot_min_depth_distribution(min_depth_frame)
```

```{r}
importance_frame <- measure_importance(rf.model)
head(importance_frame)
plot_multi_way_importance(importance_frame, size_measure = "no_of_nodes")
plot_importance_ggpairs(importance_frame)

plot_importance_rankings(importance_frame)
```
